subject: Randomly Ordered Repeating Test Suite
msgSnippet: Probably not the advice you want, but have you tried to use asserts to get more info?  Whatever the failure is, keep adding asserts about anything you can
messageBody:
Probably not the advice you want, but have you tried to use asserts to
get more info? Whatever the failure is, keep adding asserts about
anything you can think of regarding the expected state of the app and
objects under test. Even (especially?) add ones for things you may
think are obviously working correctly. This may give you some clues to
the problem.

David Corbin wrote:
> I've got one tests which fails sporadically, and I cannot figure out any
> reason for it to be non-deterministic in MY code. I've added some
> logging statements, but It's hard to get to fail.
>
